column1: TABLE D-3b. RISK-BASED ACTION LEVELS FOR TAPWATER
Calculated using Tap Water equations in USEPA Regional Screening Levels guidance (USEPA 2011a).
Addresses use of water for drinking water and inhalation of volatile chemicals during showering.
Target risk = 10-6.  Target HQ = 1.0.  See Appendix 2 for equations.
TPH (gasolines) action level rounded from 95 ug/L to 100 ug/L.
